name: VILMATE
description:
VILMATE is a software development company that works with clients in EU and the U.S. to assist them in building high quality software and high performing technology organizations. 
Services
We offer a broad variety of Software Development and IT related services.  We recruit and set up dedicated teams that you manage just as you would full-time employees. We also provide regular Outsourcing services and can assist with Legal Entity Setup for clients who wish to establish a presence in Ukraine.
Our core focus is Outstaffing:
- Same or better quality staff
- Lower wage
- Shorter recruitment period
- No employer’s taxes
- No rental and utility payments
- No costs for standard hardware and software
Technologies
We have extensive experience in all aspects of software development and IT including: 
iOS, Android, WinPhone
.NET, C#, MVC, WebAPI, Azure, WPF, WCF
Java
Python (Django)
JavaScript (AngularJS, Sencha, Knockout)
PHP (Zend framework, Magento, osCommerce, Joomla, Wordpress)
Manual & Automated testing
DevOps
